Sentencas: The present work deals with the modelling, simulation and model validation of a biogasfed tri-reformer followed by a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for power generation, and a furnace for pre-heating of the stream entering the system.
Titulo: Biogas-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) coupled to tri-reforming process: Modelling and simulation

Sentencas: In order to predict results on a micro-scale plant, the PRO/II (R) software was used for the simulation of the tri-reforming process, while ad-hoc models were developed for the SOFC and the furnace.
Titulo: Biogas-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) coupled to tri-reforming process: Modelling and simulation

Sentencas: Experimental results were outlined in a previous work
Titulo: Biogas-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) coupled to tri-reforming process: Modelling and simulation

Sentencas: [Lo Faro M, Vita A, Pino L, Arica AS.
Titulo: Biogas-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) coupled to tri-reforming process: Modelling and simulation

Sentencas: Performance evaluation of a solid oxide fuel cell coupled to an external biogas tri-reforming process.
Titulo: Biogas-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) coupled to tri-reforming process: Modelling and simulation
Biogas-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) coupled to tri-reforming process: Modelling and simulation

Sentencas: The overall system model was validated with the experimental data carried out with a laboratory scale equipment.
Titulo: Biogas-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) coupled to tri-reforming process: Modelling and simulation

Sentencas: The performance achieved on the simulated micro-scale plant was low, due to the modelled experimental conditions; nonetheless, the inherent flexibility of the model allows its application in the assessment of larger systems operating in real conditions.
Titulo: Biogas-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) coupled to tri-reforming process: Modelling and simulation
